sentences.english: The inferior and lateral convex border of the stomach is the greater curvature .
sentences.chinese: 胃的下方及侧面凸缘是胃大弯。

sentences.english: Insert the cord into the window opening flange channel in the weatherstrip seal.
sentences.chinese: 把绳索插入到防水饰条密封件处的窗户开口凸缘沟槽。

sentences.english: After improved, the pinhole rib of gearbox has no longer produced crack.
sentences.chinese: 改进后变速箱体销孔凸缘曲线不再产生裂纹现象。

sentences.english: Position weatherstrip on flange aligning notches in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 将防水饰条安放在与每个角落刻痕对齐的凸缘上。

sentences.english: Adjust windshield glass position until it is aligned with the flanges and adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 调整挡风玻璃位置直至与凸缘和粘结剂对准。

sentences.english: Flangeless cylindrical parts are a kind of drawing parts and widely applied in production.
sentences.chinese: 无凸缘筒形件是生产中应用较为普遍的一种拉深制件。

sentences.english: Analyzed drawing technology of the wide-flange and thin-wall stainless steel cylinder-shape part.
sentences.chinese: 对宽凸缘薄壁不锈钢筒形件进行了成形工艺分析。

sentences.english: Early toilet bowls were painted cast iron and had no flange on the rim.
sentences.chinese: 早期的便池是在铸铁表面涂上油漆，且上口没有凸缘。

sentences.english: It's recommended to install some flange bolts which slowly will be released to make the working with coupling more safe.
sentences.chinese: 建议安装一些凸缘螺栓，它能保证联轴节工作更安全。

sentences.english: Pull the seat belt out slightly and set the collar aside.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地将安全带拉出，然后将凸缘放到一边。

sentences.english: In this paper, the vibration characteristics of rotors connected with a flanged coupling in textile machinery are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究纺织机械中具有凸缘联轴节的转子的振动特性。

sentences.english: The paper discusses theoretically how to obtain the stress of flange deformational zone.
sentences.chinese: 本文从理论上探讨如何求解凸缘变形区的应力。

sentences.english: The machine uses the clamp to close the cap and fasten it on the edge of bottle mouth.
sentences.chinese: 本机利用夹头将瓶盖收口，紧固于瓶口凸缘上。

sentences.english: The inferior and lateral convex border of the stomach is the greater curvature.
sentences.chinese: 胃的下方及侧面凸缘是胃大弯。

sentences.english: Remove cover and clean flange and reseal.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸车轴护罩，清洁凸缘并重新密封。

sentences.english: Install the tailgate window glass in the same way the protrusion of the tailgate flange.
sentences.chinese: 用同样方法对正后挡板凸缘后安装后挡板窗玻璃。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
end face/end surface of a cylindrical object
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
